articles.description: PETALING JAYA: Defending champion Viktor Axelsen's joy was short-lived after checking into the men's singles final at the European Championships in Kyiv in Ukraine yesterday.

articles.author: Sean Martin
articles.title: Asteroid simulation by NASA and ESA confirms Earth not prepared for major strike - Daily Express
articles.description: AN ASTEROID simulation event held by NASA and the European Space Agency has confirmed has one thing: eventually, a major asteroid is going to strike our planet and we need to prepare better for it.

articles.title: Pfizer submits request for vaccine use in adolescents - RTE.ie
articles.description: The manufacturers of the Pfizer BioNTech Covid-19 vaccine have submitted a request to the European Medicines Agency to expand the use of their vaccine to include adolescents aged 12 to 15.
